--cwd: --- working directory used when resolving paths [string] [default: "/home/linux/work/x-cmd/advise/src/npx"]
--nycrc-path: --- specify an explicit path to find nyc configuration
--temp-dir|-t: --- directory to output raw coverage information to
--exclude|-x: --- a list of specific files and directories that should be excluded from coverage|glob patterns are supported
--exclude-node-modules: --- whether or not to exclude all node_module folders
--include|-n: --- a list of specific files that should be covered
--extension|-e: --- a list of extensions that nyc should handle in addition to .js [string] [default: [".js",".cjs",".mjs",".ts",".tsx",".jsx"]]
--ignore-class-methods: --- class method names to ignore for coverage
--es-modules: --- should files be treated as ES Modules
--parser-plugins: --- babel parser plugins to use when parsing the source
--preserve-comments: --- should comments be preserved in the output?
--source-map: --- should nyc detect and handle source maps?
--require|-i: --- a list of additional modules that nyc should attempt to require in its subprocess|e.g., @babel/register|@babel/polyfill  [default: []]
--exclude-after-remap: --- should exclude logic be performed after the source-map remaps filenames?
--branches: --- what % of branches must be covered?
--functions: --- what % of functions must be covered?
--lines: --- what % of lines must be covered?
--statements: --- what % of statements must be covered?
--check-coverage: --- check whether coverage is within thresholds provided
--report-dir: --- directory to output coverage reports in
--show-process-tree: --- display the tree of spawned processes
--skip-empty: --- don't show empty files (no lines of code) in report
--skip-full: --- don't show files with 100% statement|branch|and function coverage
--silent|-s: --- don't output a report after tests finish running
--all|-a: --- whether or not to instrument all files of to project (not just the ones touched by your test suite)
--eager: --- instantiate the instrumenter at startup (see https://git.io/vMKZ9)
--cache|-c: --- cache instrumentation results for improved performance
--cache-dir: --- explicitly set location for instrumentation cache
--babel-cache: --- cache babel transpilation results for improved  performance
--use-spawn-wrap: --- use spawn-wrap instead of setting process.env.NODE_OPTIONS
--clean: --- should the .nyc_output folder be cleaned before executing tests
